title: Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument: Developed Trail Rides
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Equestrian Use     Developed Trail Rides                Developed Trail Rides        One option for horseback riding is to use some of the existing hiking trails.  Keep in mind that only select hiking trails are open for equestrian use.  Â     Campground Perimeter Trail:   one mile loop easy trail water and restrooms available along the route in the campground  Victoria Mine Trail:   4.5 miles round-trip easy trail Restroom and water available at trailhead in campground  Old County Road Trail:   16 miles round-trip Easy Trail No facilities  Lost Cabin Mine Trail:   8 miles round-trip Facilities at beginning of trail in campground  Senita Basin Loop:    1.2 miles round-trip Moderate trail No facilities   Milton Mine Trail:    3.2 miles round-trip Difficult trail no facilities  Red Tanks Tinaja Trail:    1.6 miles round-trip moderate trail no facilties
